name: NBFC Loan Default Prediction Business User App
description: Credit Risk prediction employs a previously trained model to identify which customers are likely to default based on historical data.

appStages.name: Introduction
Credit-Risk-Prediction
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eForecast Cashflow Using Machine Learning\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eCredit Risk Prediction enables users to assess customer risk by uploading data, selecting a modeling type (LGD, EAD, or PD), and viewing predictive insights for informed decision-making.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n      \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Select Operation",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "inline": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": "LGD",
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "LGD (Loss Given Default)",
                  "value": "LGD",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "EAD (Exposure at Default)",
                  "value": "EL",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "PD (Probability of Default)",
                  "value": "PD",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "key": "selectSparkMLModel",
              "type": "radio",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Select LGD Stage",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "inline": true,
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": "LGDStage1",
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "LGD Stage 1",
                  "value": "LGDStage1",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "LGD Stage 2",
                  "value": "LGDStage2",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "key": "selectH2OModel",
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectSparkMLModel",
                "eq": "LGD"
              },
              "type": "radio",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Upload File",
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": false,
      "storage": "base64",
      "webcam": false,
      "fileTypes": [
        {
          "label": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "clearOnHide": false,
      "key": "file",
      "type": "file",
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "/home/sparkflows/fire-data/data/CPG-CHURN-PREDICTION-B2B-V3/processed-data/uploaded_data",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Get LGD Stage 2 Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run3",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "ac4338b3-e44f-4e18-802d-2cbda7ec142f"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectH2OModel",
                "eq": "LGDStage2"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Get EAD Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run2",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "2636da6c-f752-4f5b-bc56-c9964c6d5437"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectSparkMLModel",
                "eq": "EL"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Get PD Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run1",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "a0a36b8c-496b-4050-8d7e-29c3ab870751"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectSparkMLModel",
                "eq": "PD"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            },
            {
              "label": "Get LGD Stage 1 Prediction",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right btn-outline rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "run",
              "properties": {
                "execute": "true",
                "readFile": "true",
                "successMessage": "Prediction Has Been Completed",
                "wfId": "75ad046b-1942-4d7d-a6bc-cc70a5fdd6aa"
              },
              "conditional": {
                "show": true,
                "when": "selectH2OModel",
                "eq": "LGDStage1"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "upload",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false,
              "keyModified": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html1",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Go Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline  mt-0 float-left",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Next",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back1",
              "properties": {
                "clearResult": "true"
              },
              "type": "button",
              "event": "next",
              "input": true,
              "hideOnChildrenHidden": false
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    }
  ]
}

appStages.name: Recommendation
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eCredit Default Recommendation\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003eOverview\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eCredit Default Recommendation analyzes loan data to identify high-risk and low-risk customers, providing actionable insights and tailored recommendations to reduce defaults and optimize loan offerings.\u003c/li\u003e\r\n       \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e\r\n",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false,
      "keyModified": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Get Recommendation Insights",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "insights",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Recommendation",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-3",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv style\u003d\"border-bottom:1px solid #E0E0E0;margin-left:-16px;margin-right:-16px;\"\u003e\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,

    {
      "label": "Columns",

        {

            {

            }
          ],
          "width": 6,

          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Next",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
